package main

import (
	"crypto/tls"
	"fmt"
	"io"
	"net/http"
	"time"
)

func main() {
	Transport := &http.Transport{
		TLSClientConfig:   &tls.Config{InsecureSkipVerify: true},
		DisableKeepAlives: true,
	}
	Client := &http.Client{
		Transport: Transport,
		Timeout:   time.Duration(time.Second * 3),
	}
	requests, err := http.NewRequest("GET", "http://baidu.com/", nil)
	requests.Header.Set("User-Agent", "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/535.1 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/14.0.835.163 Safari/535.1")
	if err != nil {
		fmt.Printf("err: %v\n", err)
		return
	}
	r, err2 := Client.Do(requests)
	if err2 != nil {
		fmt.Printf("err2: %v\n", err2)
		return
	}
	defer r.Body.Close()
	b, err3 := io.ReadAll(r.Body)
	if err3 != nil {
		fmt.Printf("err3: %v\n", err3)
		return
	}
	fmt.Printf("string(b): %v\n", string(b))
}
